ygData.subject: Re: Flight spell
ygData.msgSnippet: The Flight spell that your refering to from the Research book is actually levitate.  You can pick it up at any druid guild. A note on Research.  Whenever you
ygData.messageBody:
The Flight spell that your refering to from the Research book is actually
levitate. You can pick it up at any druid guild.

A note on Research. Whenever you make something with runes, no matter what
the spell is, it will be a wizard only scroll that you produce. I
researched Enstill as well as Identify, which are both used by other
classes. But, the scroll I created was only memorizable by wizards.

Lomack
Master of Recruiting
The Crimson Knights
Fennin Ro
www.bck.org

>
> This spell is actually Levitate. In the research book it is called flight
>but it is levitate. Although I have heard it is different from the levitate
>scroll in that it is wizard only.
>
>~~Farwen "Mightyraven" Ohtarin~~
>
>VorRata wrote:
>
>> From: "VorRata" <VorRata@...>
>>
>> Might this really be Levitate? What web sight did you see it on?
>>
>> Are the runes the Rune of Expulsion and the Rune of Attraction? If so, then
>> it's levitate. If not.. COOL! What are the runes???? LOL
>>
>> -Vor
>>
